categories.name: Warring Expeditions with Collectibles
categories.icon: File:Icon Map Warring Expedition With Collectibles.png

popup.title: Aideen Park
popup.description: An amusement park built with sponsorship from the soft drink brand "SoulGlad." Recreational facilities can be seen everywhere here, and guests can indulge in honeyed nectar and release their minds from thoughts outside the dream.

popup.title: Dream Ticker
popup.description: The Sweet Dreams Troupe, previously portraying Clockie, is currently experiencing physical and mental malfunctions that require repair.

popup.title: SoulGlad Food Truck
popup.description:
{{Main|SoulGlad Food Truck}}
A roadside self-serve food truck in Penacony. For some reason, people keep trying to barge into the car to see what is inside.

popup.title: Golden Capsule Machine
popup.description: A giant capsule machine and one of the iconic landmarks of the [[Golden Hour]]. No matter if you're either the richest or poorest Dreamchaser in all the cosmos, everyone likes coming here to try their luck.

popup.title: Sweet Corner
popup.description: The path leading to the exit of Aideen Park. When you grow tired of the indulgent revelry in the center of the park, you can come to this corner of the streets for a moment of peace or a wondrous encounter.

popup.title: Dancy
popup.description:
Shared stock with Aideen Token Shop in [{{fullurl:Map:The Reverie (Reality) Floor 1|marker=1}} The Reverie (Reality) Floor 1]
{{Map Marker/Shop|Aideen Token Shop}}

popup.title: Young Master Gold's "Great Tree"
popup.description: The most resplendent tree at the town's plaza. A place where Origami Birds gather.

popup.title: Dream Ticker
popup.description: The Sweet Dreams Troupe, previously portraying Clockie, is currently experiencing physical and mental malfunctions that require repair.

popup.title: Clockie Food Truck
popup.description: A roadside self-serve food truck in Penacony. For some reason, people keep trying to barge into the car to see what is inside.

popup.title: Popcorn Food Truck
popup.description: A roadside self-serve food truck in Penacony. For some reason, people keep trying to barge into the car to see what is inside.

popup.title: Hanu's Adventure
popup.description:
An immersive dream game developed by Clock Studios.
In this game, players assume the role of the hero Hanu and engage in the animated world of Clockie, ultimately defeating the arch-villain named Boss Stone.

popup.title: Psychic Detective
popup.description: Woolsey, a member of the Bloodhound Family, is not only dedicated to his duties but also exceptionally helpful. As long as you can provide enough Aideen Tokens, he will gladly share every detail of guests' actions in the Dreamscape with you.

popup.title: Goodness Is Rare
popup.description: Adventure Mission start location

popup.title: SoulGlad Trolley
popup.description: A self-serve goods trolley. It is a common sight in Penacony with its convenience, speed of service, and ubiquitousness.

popup.title: The Reverie Hotel Entrance
popup.description: The plaza before the entrance to The Reverie. The magnificent dial stays halted and unmoving, while fountains erupt with golden syrup, reminding guests they dwell within the Dreamscape.

popup.title: Ice Cream Trolley
popup.description: A self-serve goods trolley. It is a common sight in Penacony with its convenience, speed of service, and ubiquitousness.

popup.title: Penacony Car Dealer
popup.description:
Ultimate speed, flawless protection.
Dreamscape pleasure, top-class service.
— Penacony Car Dealer, always your best choice.

popup.title: Dreamscape Sales Store
popup.description:
Come and relax... Focus, and look into my eyes...
I see your needs, your desires, and your innermost self...
Focus, and look into my eyes...
Next, I will bring you to experience the most sublime dreamscape...

popup.title: Oti Mall
popup.description: The most bustling Commercial District in the Golden Hour, established by Old Oti, head of the Alfalfa Family. Pedestrians flow through here like a never-ending stream, and splendid lights imbue this place with a radiance comparable to that of day.

popup.title: Ferdinand
popup.description: {{Map Marker/Shop|Ferdinand (Shop)}}

popup.title: Clock Diner
popup.description:
Chef's Recommendation:
[[Clockie Pizza (Whole)|Clockie Pizza]]
[[Classic SoulGlad]]
Dessert "Stargazer"
[[Jay]]'s talk show

popup.title: Newspaper Trolley
popup.description: A self-serve goods trolley. It is a common sight in Penacony with its convenience, speed of service, and ubiquitousness.

popup.title: Clockie Plaza
popup.description: An expansive central plaza. This area seems more leisurely than the crowded streets. A statue of the famous cartoon character "[[Clockie]]" towers in place here.

popup.title: Clockie Statue
popup.description: The [[Clockie]] Statue in the plaza. It is only a statue for most people. But it's rumored that a rare few with special constitutions can converse with it... and even receive benefits from it by offering it special credits!

popup.title: Penacony Food Fest
popup.description:
{{Map Marker/Event|Penacony Food Fest}}
"Twelve Hours Commercial District is joining forces to host the annual celebration!" Participate in the event at the Clock Diner to get delicacies and share Penacony specialties with your friends from other star systems!
